item.title: Report E-2024010528
item.description:
Report E-2024010528

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T15:12:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 24, 2024, one (1) 275-gallon tote of UN2922 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately 120-gallons of product to the trailer interior, pavement below the trailer, and dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Hazmat Services, Inc. (EHS) to remediate the impacted site. EHS personnel deployed granular absorbents and a neutralizing agent to remediate the site. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into six (6) 55-gallon drums. Crews transferred the remaining product in the damaged 275-gallon tote into one (1) 275 gallon tote. All containers were staged onsite for future disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024010474
item.description:
Report E-2024010474

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 24, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum containing UN2922 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Hazmat Services, Inc. (EHS) to remediate the impacted site. EHS personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted dock and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 5-gallon bucket. EHS personnel placed the damaged 55-gallon drum of product into one (1) 95-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024010074
item.description:
Report X-2024010074

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T15:12:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: NATX 302261 identified with a release from top of car. Mechanical identified the car did not contain a manway gasket. Car secured with a manway gasket and exterior decontaminated for continued movement.
